observations: Two-column flex layout uses lg:w-3/5 (left) and lg:w-2/5 (right).
Right decorative NetworkVisual participates in layout, shifting the visual centroid.
Left text block ends up ~118.5px left of the viewport center.
hero.primaryCause: Right visual is part of the flex row; the content center is computed within the 60/40 grid instead of the viewport center.

recommendedFix.decoupleRightVisual: Absolutely position the right visual on lg+ so it no longer affects layout flow; make it pointer-events-none.
recommendedFix.centerTextBlock: Constrain to max-w-3xl and center with mx-auto text-center.
recommendedFix.sectionClasses: relative min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center overflow-hidden
recommendedFix.rightVisualClasses: hidden lg:block absolute right-0 inset-y-0 w-[42vw] max-w-[640px] pointer-events-none
